_header: So blessed a sight it was to see
Subjects: carols, lullaby; dialogues, Virgin and Christ
_description: Dialogue between the Virgin Mary and her Child — eight quatrains aaab and six-line last stanza ababaa with refrain, ‘Myn own dere moder syng lulley’ and burden: ‘Lulley Jhesu lulley lulley / Myn own dere moder syng lulley’

OxfBal354.First Lines:
So blessid a sight it was to seeHow mary rokked her son so
                    fre…
OxfBal354.Last Lines:
…Þer ioye us withowt end ayMyn own dere moder syng
                    lulleyExplicit
